  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2902</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2902</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Feelings</string>
            <string language="en">Feelings</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gefühle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sentiments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sentimentos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sensibilità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συναισθήματα</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva per treballar els estats d'ànim i les diferents persones del verb ser o estar en present d'indicatiu. Conté activitats d'identificació i relació, així com una activitat per imprimir i treballar a l'aula.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on moods and the different persons of the verb 'to be' in the simple present tense. It includes activities for identifying and relating, as well as a printable exercise for classroom work.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">afectivitat</string>
            <string language="en">affectivity</string>
            <string language="es">afectividad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vocabulari</string>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
            <string language="es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf Stimmungen und die unterschiedlichen Personen des Verbs 
', zum in der einfachen Gegenwart zu sein '. Sie schließt 
Aktivitäten für das Kennzeichnen und das In Verbindung stehen, sowie
eine bedruckbare Übung für Klassenzimmerarbeit ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur 
des modes et les différentes personnes du verbe 'à être 'au 
présent simple. Il inclut des activités pour identifier et 
associer, comme un exercice imprimable pour le travail de salle de 
classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) em modos e
as pessoas diferentes do verbo ' a estar ' no tempo atual simples. 
Inclui atividades para identificar e relacionar-se, assim como 
um exercício printable para o trabalho da sala de aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sugli 
atteggiamenti e le persone differenti del verbo 'da essere 'nel 
presente semplice. Include le attività per identificare e 
riferirsi, come pure un'esercitazione stampabile per il lavoro 
dell'aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στις 
διαθέσεις και τα διαφορετικά πρόσωπα του ρήματος "για να είναι" 
στον απλό παρόντα χρόνο. Περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες 
για τον προσδιορισμό και το συσχετισμό, καθώς επίσης και μια 
εκτυπώσιμη άσκηση για την εργασία τάξεων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Emotionalität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">affectivité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
